input.sentences: there are many people on the streets today to see the parade | including police officers .
there are girls dressed in colorful costumes walking in the parade .
there is even a float moving down the street with people wearing orange shirts on it .
even spider man made an appearance to the parade .
after it is over | people are beginning to clean up the streets .
output.sentences: Everyone was waiting excitedly for the parade to begin.
Once it started, it was a beautiful display.
People wore all kinds of crazy shirts.
The appearance of the spider was the grand finale.
After the grand parade was over, every one did their part to clean up.
